# MLComputeDevice.gpu(_:)

**Case**

A device that represents a GPU compute device.

## Declaration

```swift
case gpu(MLGPUComputeDevice)
```

## Device types

- **MLComputeDevice.cpu(_:)**: A device that represents a CPU compute device.
- **MLComputeDevice.neuralEngine(_:)**: A device that represents a Neural Engine compute device.

items.description: A device that represents a CPU compute device.
